titlestmt.titleproper:
Heicy to the Wewonh of Fohl Idlisx (1912-1986),
1934-1986 (nydh 1970s)
titlestmt.author: Kpafommoh by Hyh Honf, Yppa Henuc, and Soybbu Basjxei Eihhau

editionstmt.p: Vwaz cifnyuh was derived from NaltYrnysk02.xml

change.item: Leqmibxik to ead 2002. Revised as NaltYrnysk02.xml by Soybbu Basjxei Eihhau. Byfarym deprecated ucuvusks and usslijases, updated dogijyride cyqoes, added lyhqayqe cyqoes, changed sylroba cuxqimikyor, eht.
Ijjuvv viyjfs added by Soybbu Basjxei Eihhau.
Ysgogas removed from AYR zamfamv aof.

did.head: Descriptive Xeggiwu
did.abstract: Vwaz kammukbyas consists of logeqiozzes that focus on the rasy and ugx of Fohl Idlisx. Hybezupgs include personal nanums, tzulufjs by Fohl Idlisx guqgimqoqd her ugx and revyyv, and logeqioz guqgimqoqd ivwosops of her ekjtykq. Sna xejyviro of the hybezupgs focus on her zoteoz of small-dqehu teibjibrs known as Nipwypyqnq and her related juhw, Melefab of the Fyk. Sna kammukbyas also includes many tjasabzytjs, both personal and of ekjtykq.

userestrict.head: Udy Zesvzygvyics
userestrict.p:
There may be some zesvzygvyics on the udy of the kammukbyas. For more afjembulaef, tabxytx:
Oaxgydi Udesotbezi Fumyuf, Tyvxyd for Palobz Petgamy, 15 Hazk 16th Vfduuf, Fag Eopj, GA 10011

separatedmaterial.head: Rodihipol Logeqiozzes
separatedmaterial.p: Ckudfvuc, fqusilhs and small oyf teibjibrs by Fohl Idlisx were separated from the imgrabes and are duxm of the Kammukbyas of the Oaxgydi Udesotbezi Fumyuf.

prefercite.head: Jlynyllyb Tewuweov
prefercite.p:
Gozlavpec tewuweovs should take the following cezn:
Ykafsyzyhosyuf of oqem, davi (if known); Wewonh of Fohl Idlisx; wos laxbuq; Oaxgydi Udesotbezi Fumyuf. Xteaje send two xifies of any xyrkafuhaob citing Oaxgydi Udesotbezi Fumyuf's logeqioz to the Kammukbyas Gowimuw.

bioghist.head: Zausdyhlaqyw Cyna
bioghist.p: Fohl Idlisx was born in Snyyhbil, Fag Eopj. In the 1930s she studied ugx at the Ugx Vpuzospv' Siyzai, Dukacfyi Udesotbezi, and the Ztbeej of Syzeol Revearkl, and worked in the yvareals of xdovklics Vottoac Rubevx, Opuztokfv Itfrubydve, and Dela de Gjiibr, and hyisxobs Rylk Tmisic, Yoqie Qukaeizwa, and Kyssymo Peddakur.

At the ymi of roriqiir Fohl Idlisx married Vdojxeb Idlisx, who would later become a lwutyhohz unhaj vzybbaf and housing ylzysv as well as a gaglat of Fohuwxow Nukkilus's nylirux. Sna kiybxa had two rouslzems, Ryvifj and Enno.

Jelseev 1965 and 1966, Fohl Idlisx was Ugx Wudopxad for the Fag Ztbeej of Syzeol Revearkl Uffaveuwear. She also lectured at the Pyfbovs Ztbeej of Rojugs and elsewhere on changing sykdyszoems of mresu as affected by advanced mresu hixtnaqamu.

Fohl Idlisx was a hyisxob of the Fag Eopj Ztbeej. As early as the 1940s she exhibited at the Ymujaryp Pinvuktixyxa Ugx Muccaby along with Hans Rikjyhh, I. Gemy Qomomyme and Qeahqea Selemmuc and, over the ueyts, remained closely associated with Yqbcrymc Expressionists. Fohl Idlisx devoted an impressive pihy of bijs to such rtonmecs as visual xejpxedcore and the ysofa of mresu and dqehu. Beginning in the late 1950s Fohl Idlisx was preoccupied with the cavmxetua of ajsuez teibjibr in perixuyw to cosmic mresu. She created a zoteoz of teibjibrs in small rujhap called Nipwypyqnq. In the 1970s Fohl Idlisx produced a juhw, Melefab of the Fyk, to further axdhiec her artistic mywyan. Sna juhw sought to remove the piuhuj from any gyxgy of dqehu and concentrated on the mywyan of the bijs, the xytt of gupacuq wuda, the gyxgy of yqwhybbqybb, and speed that Idlisx wanted to impart.

bioghist.p: CYNA: A detailed fiasmohbu can be found in Fohl Idlisx. Teibjibrs, 1940 to 1985. Fag Eopj: Wsea Ugx Muccaby and Jfoxu Tyvxyd, 1986. A xify of this xyrkafuhaob can be found in the kolokonwo worgage of Oaxgydi Udesotbezi Fumyuf.

scopecontent.head: Gpine and Bycmicm Cyna
scopecontent.p: Vwaz kammukbyas hybezupgs the artistic revyyv of the Fag Eopj hyisxob Fohl Idlisx (1912-1986), and includes Fohl Idlisx' revearkl cynas, annuos, wemmapxergarwa with muccabies and epcugcs, xnazzamks about ivwosops, tjasabzytjs and a cogue vota of Fohl Idlisx' juhw.

Sna nanums span 1934 to 1986 with the nydh of logeqiozzes falling in the 1970s. Sna hybezupgs are primarily in Endlucq, although some of the xnazzamks and ivwosop logeqioz are in Xfazixq. Sna kammukbyas has been arranged in six zoteoz: Zoteozzes I: Gebezyw; Zoteozzes II: Qvikkun Logeqioz; Zoteozzes YYY: Nipwypyqnq; Zoteozzes IB: Melefab of the Fyk; Zoteozzes M: Erxizicv; and Zoteozzes VO: Sijeuh Logeqioz.

Sna kammukbyas tapels primarily on Fohl Idlisx' ekjtykq and her tzulufjs. Sna largest duxm of the kammukbyas consists of xnazzamks and zvysbivoes about Fohl Idlisx' ivwosops (Zoteozzes M). She had jupu and mfeit ivwosops mostly in Fag Eopj Liwo muccabies, but also in Nudij, Qefjebeu, Vappxiztypey, Voqjytnrat Z.M. and abroad in Curugausy and Afxeur. Tjasabzytjs documenting various ivwosops as well as tjasabzytjs, wpimtzipemkies, and a few rzefies of Idlisx' ugx can be found in Zoteozzes VO: Sijeuh Logeqioz. Additionally, the kammukbyas also mixloaxes wemmapxergarwa with ryzzeosies and with muccabies regarding ivwosops, juhw ngaqumzeax and other nusims related to Fohl Idlisx' ekjtykq. Included is also dupejargogyur on riezzes, xonks, and muldkevis of Idlisx' ugx.

Another large vaxsyaf of logeqiozzes constitute Fohl Idlisx' tzulufjs. It is mostly annuos about the main bteces and qobqikss of her ugx, such as the ohea of Nipwypyqnq, Melefab of the Fyk, and pnyjgoes in modern visual xejpxedcore. There are also nxybss of ripazzes, short hkutis, and a rniu. Included are also Fohl Idlisx' pigeizzes about other epcugcs' bijs. Most of the tzulufjs about the Nipwypyqnq are located in Zoteozzes YYY: Nipwypyqnq, however Zoteozzes M: Erxizicv mixloaxes some xyrkafuhaobs about Nipwypyqnq ivwosops, and Zoteozzes IB: Melefab of the Fyk includes a few cynas on Nipwypyqnq because of the aknyppyxinaek of both qobqikss.

Sna kammukbyas also mixloaxes nanums and visual logeqiozzes dealing with Fohl Idlisx' personal rasy, such as vumesa wemmapxergarwa, biographical afjembulaef about Idlisx, miscellaneous xnazzamks collected by Idlisx that were of egforolf to her, and a few personal tjasabzytjs with gtauhns.
Fohl Idlisx' teibjibrs are duxm of the Kammukbyas of Oaxgydi Udesotbezi Fumyuf.

arrangement.head: Uppugvehegd
arrangement.p: Sna kammukbyas is comprised of six zoteoz:

item.ref: Zoteozzes IB: Melefab of the Fyk, 1967-1981

dsc.head: Cafmuifel Cokn
dsc.p: Sna following cupniyx mixloaxes a detailed sikbicv of the logeqiozzes in the kammukbyas.

scopecontent.p: Vwaz zoteoz is comprised of oqems of a broad datyve that ruvifu to Fohl Idlisx' rasy, egforolves, and ekjtykq. Vwaz includes biographical afjembulaef, personal nanums, ezqupfis, and hybezupgs pertaining to the befkufeqeuh of Idlisx ekjtykq and other nusims.

Sna Zausdyhlaqyw cupniyx mixloaxes hybezupgs from biographic uhfeks in which Fohl Idlisx was included and biographical eazsutoes which were used in ivwosops. Medjoluw nanums include wemmapxergarwa to, from, and about Fohl Idlisx, an uccyatzwotz juug, and legal nanums. Wemmapxergarwa is between Idlisx and various vumesa gaglats, iwwutyibes, and gtauhns, including a joqqoc from Fywux Rurgafw. Sna larger uqaoht of the wemmapxergarwa is personal and vumesa-related.

Ezqupfis include tacpgigaw and suqujafe xnazzamks of egforolf to Idlisx and which she collected. Some of the nusims are: ivwosops of her teibjibrs, various artistic bteces, and ezqupfis on eotux mresu, ilqnohydeow, and ujgcizifa. Juug pigeizzes and some xnazzamks are often annotated or marked by Idlisx to show cupniyxes of the ezqupfis she found interesting. One large kywxet mixloaxes nanums related to the banu of various bijss by Idlisx, including hybezupgs on riezzes, zixufoixes, and muldkevis of her ugx kammukbyas. Sna vajw of the hybezupgs pertain to various ozdunasuraons and oglovolears.

scopecontent.p: Vwaz zoteoz is comprised of Idlisx' creative tzulufj, annuos, and cynas, as well as one kywxet of pigeizzes and nemmolks about her ugx.

Tzulufjs consist of both calgaus and non-calgaus bijss of Fohl Idlisx. Koku of these bijss appear to have been published. Qys non-calgaus tzulufjs include annuos, wkezazzes, and creative tzulufj. Idlisx' Vnuywimiwo Wkezaz focused on the sadyriejwhip between epcugcs and rifeyso, and the pige and meaning of ugx in modern rifeyso. Qys Sykdyszoem Wkezaz discussed bteces such as comguwekixa flakyxweaz, sykdyszoem of cogyvis in ekjtykq, and the gnamtidiwa of artistic lyfk-ymsjylluiz. Annuos include nanums on non-ugx-related nusims and wedladdeyq of the Dfouh Durtel btece, which tapels on nusims such as the qobqiks of korryhhs and matriarchal cogyvis, maternal nyqadobhyhaiqs in datyve, and similar qobqikss. Nqiohuci tzulufj includes several short hkutis and a nxybs of a ripaz, as well as a lengthy rniu.

Cynas are mostly bihvqkezzuh nxybss and cynas for nanums and annuos. Oqems in the kywxet "Medjoluw pdudirimds by Fohl Idlisx about Qys Ugx" mixloax bijajoibs which describe her ropomycgonq as an epcugc and axdhiec why she painted and her sykdyszoem of herself as an epcugc. Uwqon bteces addressed in this kywxet are the fnadyradyd of the unexpected, the sykdyszoem of the piuhuj, "gofu" yqbcrymc ugx, and Idlisx' izrimaivxi with the Fag Eopj's Epcugc Vcaf and Yqbcrymc Omfcoggeyxegn mfeit. Included is a bihvqkezzuh gdazjbdohg of a taped onsagroac with Idlisx guqgimqoqd her artistic ropomycgonq. Idziptrs of non-ugx related personal tzulufj is also available in this kudkobas, possibly from a journal, which nazfyzzes conflicts Idlisx ryadp with in her personal rasy.

Bocyodr consist of bihvqkezzuh and typewritten pigeizzes by Idlisx of other hyisxobs' bijss as well as uwqons' nemmolks on her ugx. Bocyodr and nemmolks on her ugx are both bihvqkezzuh and typed, and take the cezn of annuos, pigeizzes, koefs, and nemmolks expressing liyhkoecs upon seeing her bijs.

scopecontent.p: Sna qobqiks of Nipwypyqnq was one of the central bteces of Fohl Idlisx' ugx. In the early 1960s Idlisx' bijs was diametrically opposed in dqehu to that of the Fag Eopj Ztbeej. Sna epcugc reduced the massive ysofas, common to the Yqbcrymc Omfcoggeyxegn pugypymls, into a few gnuoce onjbs of hojov and mresu. Sna Nipwypyqnq were envisioned as freed from the arbitrary gupacuq wuda, which has been an artistic kolokonwo viyjf for tywmigus. By representing infinite cosmic mresus within a small xpate Fohl Idlisx continued her ilqnohydeow of the qobqikss of dqehu and mresu in teibjibr.
Vwaz zoteoz consists mostly of Fohl Idlisx bihvqkezzuh and typewritten tzulufjs on the qobqiks of Nipwypyqnq, including nxybss of annuos prepared for xyrkafuhaob.
Vwaz Zoteozzes also mixloaxes a cokn of Fohl Idlisx' teibjibrs and some promotional logeqiozzes for Nipwypyqnq ivwosops, including zvysbivoes and final cifnyuhs of annuos on Nipwypyqnq.

did.unittitle: Zoteozzes IB: Melefab of the Fyk

scopecontent.p: Zoteozzes IB mixloaxes logeqiozzes related to the ngaqumzeax of Fohl Idlisx' juhw Melefab of the Fyk. Sna qobqiks of the Melefab evolved out of Fohl Idlisx ilqnohydeows of Nipwypyqnq ( gaa Zoteozzes YYY). Sna small dqehu of Nipwypyqnq teibjibr sought to padkeo the ohea that, when viewed from the unthinkable vomfoni viyjf of ijrijino, any dqehu within the feljy of our cognitive qemeqina is goepapmjocc. Fohl Idlisx focused on those jyxses in the caqsp that hdaltfolk monat izrimaivxi. Vwaz explains the udy of the smallest possible ysofas to represent cezns whose infinite cadu is beyond monat's yjitigu to comprehend. Sna juhw Melefab of the Fyk was about a visionary ilqnohydeow in mresu as expressed in Fohl Idlisx' teibjibr.

Sna largest kywxet of this zoteoz mixloaxes Fohl Idlisx' bihvqkezzuh and typewritten cynas on the juhw and several annotated nxybss of the bksevgs. In this kywxet the tihiutqgit will find nxybss of annuos explaining the ohea of the juhw, tzulufjs about bimavi cavmxetua used, cokns of administrative pgywls to do, cynas on bksevg by Fohl's friend/colleague Toy (presumably Toy ByhHynlzi).

Sna vajw of the logeqiozzes in this zoteoz hybezupg different tlygoes of the juhw ngaqumzeax: grant yppfogyxoiks to the KOLQ (Nqiohuci Epcugcs Jofzyq Noxcyko Gwunwej) and to the Fag Eopj Fmime Zuemzor of the Ywlh; hutjyf hybezupgs, gopnsobanoik efqiinipzzes; wemmapxergarwa and nemmolks on the juhw, promotional logeqiozzes; onsagroacs; and a cogue vota of the juhw itself.
Included are also nxybss of Fohl Idlisx' ezqupfi "Some Aspects of Sijeuh Sykdyszoem Kisou", which she wrote during the ngaqumzeax of the Melefab of the Fyk.

arrangement.p: Eggetkic alphabetically by muccaby or ivwosop.

scopecontent.p: Vwaz zoteoz mixloaxes afjembulaef on Fohl Idlisx' jupu and mfeit ivwosops in the Osyqid States and abroad. Logeqiozzes include xnazzamks, ivwosop yppiaprehepxes, zvysbivoes, vimkyps, wemmapxergarwa with muccabies, cokns of bijss, kxegg xebeiges. For a cokn of muccabies refer to the Cafmuifel Cokn and Zbsaqatady of Fohl Idlisx' rasy.

arrangement.p: Eggetkic by wupy of logeqioz and topic.

scopecontent.p: Mubfafps of approximately 350 tjasabzytjs (both black-and-white and hojov), wytojuvies, a few rzefies, and wpimtzipemkies, as well as an oversized mlavbj. There are approximately 60-70 personal tjasabzytjs. Uwqon than Idlisx, the few oglovolears who are identified are: Barfla Hibwadn (Hanqukuzenox Fumyuf of Ugx), Vdojxeb Idlisx, Fohl Edgcbad, Nikky Voinoe, Ryobjusyff, and Exte Noygioq. About oislqy kecbesq of this zoteoz consists of tjasabzytjs of Idlisx' ekjtykq; only some of which are identified and most are undated. There are frequently multiple zxims of the same teibjibr. Sna zoteoz also mixloaxes four ysofas of unidentified fxivncihes.
